krait.http_response module¶

class krait.http_response.Response(http_version, status_code, headers, body)[source]¶

Bases: object

Wraps a HTTP response.

status_reasons = {304: 'Not Modified', 400: 'Bad Request', 403: 'Forbidden', 404: 'Not Found', 401: 'Unauthorized', 200: 'OK', 500: 'Internal Server Error', 302: 'Found'}¶
